turkish_example_sentence: Biz arkadaşlarımızla her fırsatta eğlenceli aktiviteler buluruz.
english_example_sentence: We find fun activities with our friends at every opportunity.
russian_example_sentence: Мы находим веселые занятия с нашими друзьями при каждой возможности.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz arkadaşlarımızla her fırsatta eğlenceli aktiviteler ______.
